title: Psalm 53
content:
(Monday and Thursday)
O God, save me by Your name;* by Your power, uphold my cause.
O God, hear my prayer;* listen to the words of my mouth.
For the proud have risen against me,* ruthless foes seek my life.
They have no regard for God.* But I have God for my help. The Lord upholds my life.
Let the evil recoil upon my foes;* You Who are faithful, destroy them.
I will sacrifice to You with willing heart* and praise Your name for it is good;
For You have rescued me from all my distress* and my eyes have seen the downfall of my foes.
